```{r}
library(tidyverse, ggplot2)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("meta.csv")
df %>% 
  group_by(num) %>% 
  summarise(
    num = first(num),
    answer = mean( as.numeric(answer), na.rm=TRUE),
    prompt = first(prompt)
  )


```
